name: Kill The Dragon (WallaceLovecraft)
description:
CLICK THE BOTTOM RIGHT ARROWS IF PLAYING ON BROWSER TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN AND NOT CUT OFF MY ART! Use ESC to exit the game.

F4 can also full screen.

Press F3 in the browser window to fit screen if you can't full screen.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Kill The Dragon is a choose your own adventure game. You go in search for the dragon to kill but watch out because there are gruesome deaths ahead!

This game was originally developed inside my other game called NO LOVE. Now it’s available as its own standalone game! I had a lot of fun making it so I hope you have fun playing it

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

CONTROLS

On a keyboard

Z to confirm

X to cancel

Arrow keys to move

On a gamepad

A to confirm

B to cancel

D-pad to move

On a mouse

Left click to confirm

Right click to cancel

On a smartphone

Touch the screen and click your choice

Your phone must be able to display 1920x1080

You can also use special keys while on a personal computer (PC).

Press the (F3) key to fit window.

Press the (F4) key to fullscreen.

Press the (F5) key to reload the game.

Also, holding down the confirm or cancel key speeds up the text. That is all, have fun!

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Warning: This game is not for children. There are some horrific and scary deaths. Cartoon violence.
